title: Google Kubernetes Engine Customized for Faster AI Work
author: Joab Jackson
description: Google Cloud is enhancing its Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) to better support the growing demand for AI workloads.
cntitle: 针对更快 AI 工作负载定制的 Google Kubernetes Engine
cndescription: Google Cloud 正在增强其 Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE)，以更好地支持对 AI 工作负载日益增长的需求。
